definition: literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
speech sounds/pronunciation/colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character/phonetic/audio/voice/(Internet) to voice chat/voice message
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression

sentences.english: Context is the most frequently studied theme in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 語境是當前語用學研究的一個熱點。

sentences.english: Most Asians also speak English and Swahili .
sentences.chinese: 大多數亞洲人也講英語和斯瓦希里語。

sentences.english: This is sometimes called body language.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們有時所說的身姿語。

sentences.english: What sort of farewell is that?
Incorporate quotations of three lines or less into the text, within single quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 文本中三行或更少的合併的引用語，用單引號。

sentences.english: Smiling at the Dornish knights, she switched back to the Common Tongue.
sentences.chinese: 邊對多恩騎士微笑，她邊轉換成通用語。

sentences.english: The inflated style itself is a kind of euphemism.
sentences.chinese: 這種華而不實的風格本身就是一種委婉語。

sentences.english: I'm just really sad I couldn't give my speech in Gaelic.
sentences.chinese: 我只是感到傷心不能用蘇格蘭語發表感言。

sentences.english: Its closest relatives are Turkish and Turkmen.
sentences.chinese: 與它最接近的是土耳其語和土庫曼語。

sentences.english: The source of the word, Pygmalion is ancient Greece.
The Mid-Autumn night language sends to long for, spending a good month a circle a circle with difficult feeling.
sentences.chinese: 中秋夜語寄相思，花好月圓情難圓。

sentences.english: The letter bears the salutation “Dear Sir”。
sentences.chinese: 信上寫有稱呼語“親愛的先生”。

sentences.english: Note the preset replies in both English and Creole.
sentences.chinese: 注意有英語和克里奧爾語兩種預設回覆。

sentences.english: The abundance of linguistic culture leads to diversifications in the contents and forms of allusions.
sentences.chinese: 豐富的語言文化造就了典故語豐富多彩的內容和形式。

sentences.english: Similar to the pronunciation of English often cause misconceiving between English-speaking.
sentences.chinese: 發音相似的媖語常常引起講媖語偖之間的悞會。
